ComicInfo.Title: Proper Preparation and Planning, Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary: The Homelander goes head to head with the source of his greatest torment, while Vought's Jess Bradley gets a bump up- and starts considering drastic action. Butcher, meanwhile, takes us on a trip down memory lane to the Boys' first meeting with the Seven- and the nightmare that ensued for one member of the team...
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-19 09:21:11. [CVDB247212]
ComicInfo.Characters: Black Noir, Butcher, Female of the Species, Frenchman, Greg Mallory, Jack from Jupiter, Jess Bradley, Mother's Milk, Queen Maeve, Terror, The Deep, The Homelander, The Lamplighter
ComicInfo.Teams: The Boys, The Seven, Vought American
ComicInfo.Locations: Flatiron Building, New York City, New York State, Washington D.C., Washington State
